title: Looking for Carol Twombly
content:
Hello,

I am Mary Beth (Mudgett) ODonnell and I am looking for an email or other address for  
Carol Twombly. I knew her from High School - where we were in some Art classes together.  
If anyone knows where I might find her, I can be reached at emailmb [atsign] mac [dot] com. ( I lost access to the other accounts)  
NickName (for me) was Fung...

Any help would be appreciated.  
Thank you,

I'd love to just say Hi, Carol... Hope you are well.

Mary Beth Mudgett O'Donnell  
from Massachusetts - now a bit further North in the Mountains...  
August 6, 2009
author: marybethmudgett...

comments.content:
P.S.

Carol Twombly - if you read this,  
I just wanted to get in touch - personal not professional nor  
any other reasons.

I hope you are well!  
Mary Beth (Mudgett) ODonnell "Fung"

Hi, Mary Beth.

As far as the type world goes Carol Twombly has retired. I will forward you note to someone who might be able to put you in touch.
what kind of art did you studdie?

Hello,

I am Mary Beth (Mudgett) ODonnell and I am looking for an email or other address for  
Carol Twombly. I knew her from High School - where we were in some Art classes together.  
If anyone knows where I might find her, I can be reached at emailmb [atsign] mac [dot] com.  
 ( I lost access to the other accounts)  
NickName (for me) was "Fung"...

Any help would be appreciated.  
Thank you,  
----------------------  
I'd love to just say Hi, Carol... Hope you are well.

Mary Beth Mudgett O'Donnell  
from Massachusetts - have moved back south a bit still in the area.  
March 2, 2010

P.S.

Carol Twombly - if you read this,  
I just wanted to get in touch - personal not professional nor  
any other reasons. Just to say hi.

I hope you are well!  
Mary Beth (Mudgett) ODonnell "Fung"
